ygData.subject: RE: wis items
ygData.msgSnippet: You will never buy a silver ruby veil from my jeweler then. The ruby itself costs 140pp with the best faction I ve been able to acheive. And, although I am a
ygData.messageBody:
You will never buy a silver ruby veil from my jeweler then. The ruby itself
costs 140pp with the
best faction I've been able to acheive. And, although I am a fairly
experienced jeweler for being 13th level, it just trivialed out on me! I
still fail quite a bit making these. I sell my silver ruby veils for 275pp.
I generally try to sell silver stuff for twice the cost it takes me to make
one. To even out the EXPENSIVE failures.

Meara, level 13 Enchanter of Erud, owner Meara's Boutique of mystiques,
skill 81 jeweler, Solusek Ro

>-----Original Message-----
>From: Alvarez, Ruben (consultant) [mailto:ruben.alvarez@...]
>Sent: Friday, December 10, 1999 9:05 AM
>To: 'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com'
>Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] wis items
>
>
>From: "Alvarez, Ruben (consultant)" <ruben.alvarez@...>
>
>For the silver Ruby vail I wouldnt pay anything more then 200pp for it. I
>bought mine for 175pp. But other servers and where you get it all depends
>on the price.
